Text: Re HBA Summer Clerkship ProgramFYI I understand that ExxonMobil is paying its st year summer clerks per month and that Compaq is paying per hour Thanks Bruce PM Bruce Enron North America Corp selected candidates for interview for summer clerkship positions from the resumes you forward Two were made offers with both accepting the offers The two clerks we have working this summer are Alisha Mahabir South Texas College of Law Nabil Nachawati University of Houston Law Center Nabil will be working the st half of the summer and Alisha will be working the nd half of the summer Thanks for all your help with this process If you need any further information please do not hesitate to call me at Gerald Nemec

HBA Summer Clerkship Program Cc The Opportunities for Minorities in the Legal Profession committee of the Houston Bar Association would like to invite the first year summer associates who are clerking at Enron this summer and who obtained their position through the Committees First Year Summer Clerkship Program to attend the Committees Third Annual Summer Associate Luncheon which will be held at the Houston Club Rusk on Thursday from am to pm Please forward this invitation to the two first year summer clerks that Enron has hired through the HBA First Year Summer Clerkship Program Alisha Mahabir South Texas and Nabil Nachawati U of H The theme of this years luncheon is Soaring to New Heights in the New Millennium The speakers will include among other City Council Member Gordon Quan the Honorable Vanessa D Gilmore Celso GonzalesFalla a Partner at VE and Shawn Roberts of Abraham Watkins Nicols Sorrells Matthews Friend The panelists will speak about the different aspects of practicing law and living in Houston Summer associates will have the opportunity to ask questions and meet with the panelists and other prominent minority members of the Houston legal community The luncheon will also serve as a great opportunity for the summer associates to learn about Houstons dynamic and diverse legal practice and meet other minorities who are clerking in Houston during the summer I hope that Alisa and Nabil will join us at the luncheon I hope to see you and some of your colleagues as well Thanks and please contact me if you have any questions Bruce J Ruzinsky
